parsedElements.name: Sliding Fee Discount Program Policies
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of project narrative Response Section, items 5) a, b and c pdf pages 26-27 and SFDS Attachment 10: Sliding Fee Discount Schedule(s) finds that the health center is compliant with element b. Sliding Fee Discount Program Policies.

parsedElements.name: Sliding Fee for Column I Services
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of Attachment 10: Sliding Fee Discount Schedule(s) and Attachment 13: Health Center Program Compliance Narrative finds that the health center is compliant, the health center's SFDS(s) is structured consistent with its policy and provides the required discounts.

parsedElements.name: Incorporation of Current Federal Poverty Guidelines
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of Attachment 10: Sliding Fee Discount Schedule(s) and non-response through a Correspondence Request submission in the EHBs (date sent 12/8/2025 and due date 12/22/2025) finds that the health center is not compliant with Sliding Fee Discount Program element e. Incorporation of Current Federal Poverty Guidelines. The applicant did not provide a Sliding Fee Schedule with Current Federal Poverty Guidelines; attached a 2018 Sliding Fee Schedule(s).

parsedElements.name: Documentation for Key Management Staff Positions
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of project narrative Management Teams Section, items 3-5 pdf page 35-36, Attachment 4: Position Descriptions, and Attachment 5 for Key Management Staff finds that the health center is compliant with element b. Documentation for Key Management Staff Positions.

parsedElements.name: CEO Responsibilities
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of the project narrative Management Teams, items 3-5 pdf pages 35-36 Form 2: Staffing Profile; Attachment 3: Project Organizational Chart; and Attachment 4: Position Descriptions for Key Management Staff and Attachment 5: Biographical Sketches for Key Management Staff finds that the health center is compliant with element d. CEO Responsibilities.

parsedElements.name: HRSA Approval for Contracting Substantive Programmatic Work
parsedElements.comments: If N/A, Program Specialist's review of Attachment 7: Summary of Contracts and Agreements, Attachment 13: Health Center Program Compliance Narrative and Form 8: Health Center Agreements finds that the health center has no arrangements with a contractor to perform substantive programmatic work.

parsedElements.name: Required Contract Provisions
parsedElements.comments: If N/A, Program Specialist's review of project narrative Capacity, items 1) b and c pdf page 52-53; Attachment 7: Summary of Contracts and Agreements, Attachment 13: Health Center Program Compliance Narrative and Form 8: Health Center Agreements finds that the health center has no contracts that support the HRSA-approved scope of project.

parsedElements.name: HRSA Approval to Subaward
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of Attachment 13: Health Center Program Compliance Narrative and Form 8: Health Center Agreements finds that the health center has no subaward to carry out a portion of the proposed HRSA award scope of project.

parsedElements.name: Subaward Agreement
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of Attachment 13: Health Center Program Compliance Narrative and Form 8: Health Center Agreements finds that the health center has no subaward to carry out a portion of the proposed HRSA award scope of project.

parsedElements.name: Coordination and Integration of Activities
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of project narrative Collaboration section items 1 and 2 a-d pdf pages 28-30 and Attachment 9: Collaboration Documentation finds that the health center is complaint, document its collaboration efforts in the service area to support reductions in the non-urgent use of hospital emergency, continuity of care, and access to other health or community services.

parsedElements.name: Collaboration with Other Primary Care Providers
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of project narrative Collaboration Section, items 1) and 2) a-e pdf pages 28-30 and Attachment 9: Collaboration Documentation finds that the health center is compliant, documents its collaboration efforts to coordinate and integrate activities with primary care providers (federally funded entities, State and local).

parsedElements.name: Participation in Insurance Programs
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of Program Narrative pdf page 37, Attachment 13: Health Center Program Compliance Narrative and Form 3: Income Analysis finds that the health center provided description of participation in Medicaid, CHIP, Medicare, and as appropriate, other public or private assistance programs or health insurance.

parsedElements.name: Policies or Procedures for Waiving or Reducing Fees
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of Attachment 13: Health Center Program Compliance Narrative find that the health center provided description of board-approved policies, as well as operating procedures, that include the specific circumstances when the health center will waive or reduce fees or payments required by the center due to any patient's inability to pay.

parsedElements.name: Annual Budgeting for Scope of Project
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of Budget Narrative and non-response through a Correspondence Request submission in the EHBs (date sent 12/8/2025 and due date 12/22/2025) finds that the health center is not compliant with Budget element a. Annual Budgeting for Scope of Project. The applicant did not provide a Budget Narrative to HRSA for a 4-year period of performance nor the Federal Personnel Justification salary document to support the health center's proposed scope of project. The applicant instead provided an annual budget of $650,000 for April 1, 2024 - March 31, 2025.

parsedElements.name: Revenue Sources
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of SF-424A, Budget Narrative and Form 3: Income Analysis finds the health center's annual budget is compliant, includes each requested 12-month period of the 4-year project and all other projected revenue sources that will support the Health Center Program project.

parsedElements.name: Maintenance of Board Authority Over Health Center Project
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of project narrative Governance Section, items 1-3 pdf pages 37-38, and Capacity Section, items 1) a-c pdf page 35-36, Attachment 2: Bylaws, Attachment 3: Project Organizational Chart, Form 8, and Attachment 13: Health Center Program Compliance Narrative finds that the health center ensures the health center's governing board maintains the authority for oversight of the Health Center Program project.

parsedElements.name: Required Authorities and Responsibilities
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of Attachment 2: Bylaws finds that the health center is compliant, the health center's articles of incorporation, bylaws, or other relevant documents outline the required authorities and responsibilities of the governing board.

parsedElements.name: Board Member Selection and Removal Process
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of Attachment 2: Bylaws finds the health center's Board bylaws document specify the process for ongoing selection and removal of board members.

parsedElements.name: Required Board Composition
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of Attachment 13: Health Center Program Compliance Narrative, Attachment 2: Bylaws and Form 6A: Current Board Member Characteristics finds the health center is compliant, health center's documents provide the required board composition.

parsedElements.name: Current Board Composition
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review of Attachment 13: Health Center Program Compliance Narrative and Form 6A: Current Board Member Characteristics finds the health center has provided documentation that the current board composition is composed according to the requirement.

parsedElements.name: Waiver Requests
parsedElements.comments: Program Specialist's review Form 6B: Request for Waiver of Board Member Requirements finds that element e. Waiver Requests does not apply to this health center.
